lexUnit.name: clang.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a loud, resonant metallic sound.

sentence.text: There was a loud clang and Broomhead cursed vehemently , pulling on the reins .
They hate the way all their songs end with a huge clang of guitars , the way they holler things like ` Viva Boys Wonder ! " s if they 're going to be around forever .
He was aware of the clattering of shipboard work , the chatter and clang of steam cranes .
As they walked along the street they heard the strident clang of a fire engine .
She found she was straining her ears for the musical clang of the town church bells .
He heard the clang of metal on metal , and a ricochet whined viciously past his head .
The clang of a sword blade ringing on the stones where she had just been standing made the order unnecessary .
There was the clang of metal as a bar was withdrawn .
In that moment , Emily turned , wrenched open the front door , with a clang of the coiled bell overhead , and escaped .
A running and ringing in the darkening afternoon , urgent voices on the phone and the grind and clang of the lift as it came and went .
Whitechurch continued : “ Closely adjacent to the sawmills is the Smiths ” Shop … a large building resounding with the clang of the hammer , and bright with forge-fires and hot iron .
By Tuesday 20th Bob had blown away so at 5.30am we heard the clang of the chow bell to awaken us and we made our preparations to get underway .
The jangle of harness , the clang of steel , the choked-off screams , all seemed damped down , as if a mist enshrouded them .
Then there was a clang as the driver opened the door and climbed down .
Now she too buckles on the hookboots and turns a graceful cartwheel to bring their hooks , with a faint clang , against a couple of the walking rings in the ceiling .
The stone struck the wooden window surround and fell back hitting the metal cover of the rainwater butt with a loud clang .
But even so the soft clang rang sharply in the silence and echoed around him as he made his way down the nave .
A sharp metallic clang announced the departure of a Cerean soul , bound for wherever those lads go to once parted from their unearthly bodies .
